ValidationRule.description: For an independent discretionary request and for a discretionary request associated to campaign, user can create only, either Direct sell or Demo type discretionary request.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(OR(AND( Campaign__c = null, Opportunity__c = null,not(ispickval( Type__c , 'Direct Sell')), not(ispickval( Type__c , 'Demo'))),AND( Campaign__c <> null, Opportunity__c = null,not(ispickval( Type__c , 'Direct Sell')), not(ispickval( Type__c , 'Demo')))),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Select ' Direct sell' or 'Demo' as Type .
